question.text:
Given below are two statements, one is labelled as Assertion A and the other is labelled as Reason R.
Assertion A: can be subjected to Wolff-Kishner reduction to give 
Reason R: Wolff-Kishner reduction is used to convert  into 
In the light of the above statements, choose the correct answer from the options given below:

options.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi></math> is true but <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">R</mi></math> is false
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi></math> is false but <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">R</mi></math> is true

Both <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">R</mi></math> are true and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">R</mi></math> is the correct explanation of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi></math>

Both <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">R</mi></math> are true and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">R</mi></math> is NOT the correct explanation of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi></math>

solution.text:
The reagent hydrazine in alkaline medium is used in the Wolff-Kishner reduction reaction. In this reaction aldehydes and ketone converts to respective alkanes.

This reaction is not good for base sensitive groups in the carbonyl compounds.  The following chloro carbonyl compound give alkene as elimination reaction expected in basic medium.
